[certx.database.migration_backend]
sqlalchemy = certx.db.sqlalchemy.migration

[certx.provider.key.gm]
default = certx.provider.key.gm:DefaultSmKeyProvider
openssl = certx.provider.x509.openssl:OpensslGmKeyProvider

[certx.provider.x509.gm]
default = certx.provider.x509.gm:DefaultCertificateProvider
openssl = certx.provider.x509.openssl:OpensslGMCertificateProvider

[console_scripts]
certx-dbsync = certx.cmd.dbsync:main
certx-server = certx.server:start

[oslo.config.opts]
certx = certx.conf.opts:list_opts
